Stella Isodo Apolot bụ onye omeiwu Ugandan onye na-erule n'ọnwa Machị 2021 bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị a họpụtara maka Ngora District
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ nwere njikọ na Forum for Democratic Change party.

Apolot Isodo nwere njikọ na otu Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) nke ọ gbara ọsọ na ntuli aka afọ 2016 ruo afọ 2021 nke Uganda. A mara ya dị ka onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ pati n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020 mgbe o meriri onye mmegide ya na ntuli aka nke pati.
O bu ụzọ gbaa ọsọ maka oche ahụ n'afọ 2016 ma merie Jacqueline Amongin.
Isodo Apolot lụrụ Samuel Isodo, onye ọka iwu
O nwere ụmụ atọ: Apio Joanne, Isodo Arnold na Okiror AllanBill.
